H0.text: Neutral pH is the property of water that has the greatest effect on the water cycle.

H1.text: Freezing and boiling points are the properties of water that have the greatest effect on the water cycle.

H2.text: Dissolves many substances is the property of water that has the greatest effect on the water cycle.

H3.text: Forms six-sided crystals is the property of water that has the greatest effect on the water cycle.

A4.text: The salinity of the oceans is derived from erosion and transport of dissolved salts from the land.
